main event: A reddish globe-shaped object was observed in the sky over San Francisco on May 17, 1955.
interesting points: The object was stationary in the western sky for a few minutes,The witness described the object as about the size of a football when held at arm's length,The observation was aided by optical means,The object disappeared at tremendous speed after a brief sighting,The conclusion drawn from the observation was that it might have been Jupiter.
witness description: Single observation reported with optical aid
